description:
PorteuX 1.8 is now available for download as the first distribution to ship with the Xfce 4.20 desktop environment. Here's what else is new in this release!

The post Slackware-Based PorteuX 1.8 Is One of the First Distros to Ship with Xfce 4.20 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Slackware-Based PorteuX 1.8 Is One of the First Distros to Ship with Xfce 4.20
